Avalanche.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 5s after getting a Killing Blow.

Biting Cold.card_desc: [Ice Block] Generate {scale=2|2} Ammo after activating Ice Block.

Chilled.card_desc: [Blink] Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 4s after using Blink.

Cold Acclimation.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon deals {scale=60|10}% less Self-Damage and no longer applies a Knockback to yourself.

Cold-Blooded.card_desc: [Ice Block] Reduce the Cooldown of Ice Block by {scale=1|1}s.

Frigid Field.card_desc: [Ice Block] Heal for {scale=50|50} every 1s while Ice Block is active.

Great Distance.card_desc: [Soar] Increase the duration of Soar by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Howling Gale.card_desc: [Ice Block] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 4s after Ice Block ends.

Impact.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting a Killing Blow.

Killing Frost.card_desc: [Soar] Reduce the Cooldown of Soar by {scale=20|20}% after getting a Killing Blow.

Over the Moon.card_desc: [Soar] Increase the damage you deal with your weapon shots by 20% for 3s after Soar ends.

Riftwalk.card_desc: [Blink] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after using Blink.

Snow Globe.card_desc: [Ice Storm] Ice Storm has its damage increased by 100% and its Ultimate charge decreased by 50%, but its duration is reduced to 3s.

Swift Witch.card_desc: [Soar] Increase your Movement Speed during Soar by {scale=5|5}%.

Teleport.card_desc: [Blink] Increase the distance traveled by Blink by {scale=6|6}%.

Wormhole.card_desc: [Blink] Blink can be refired within 4s of its use to return to the initial casting location.

Flackern.card_desc: [Blinzeln] Nach Verwendung von Blinzeln wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Flinke Hexe.card_desc: [Gleitflug] Erhöht dein Flugtempo während Gleitflug um {scale=5|5}%.

Heulender Sturm.card_desc: [Eisblock] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach dem Ende von Eisblock 4s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Kaltbl\u00fctig.card_desc: [Eisblock] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Eisblock um {scale=1|1}s.

K\u00e4lteanpassung.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine Waffe stößt dich nicht mehr zurück und verursacht {scale=60|10}% weniger Selbstverletzung.

Kaltgestellt.card_desc: [Blinzeln] Erhöht das Nachladetempo nach Verwendung von Blinzeln 4s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Klirrende K\u00e4lte.card_desc: [Eisblock] Nach Aktivierung von Eisblock wird {scale=2|2} Munition erzeugt.

Kluftlauf.card_desc: [Blinzeln] Erhöht das Nachladetempo nach Verwendung von Blinzeln 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

K\u00fchlfeld.card_desc: [Eisblock] Während Eisblock wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Langdistanz.card_desc: [Gleitflug] Erhöht die Dauer von Gleitflug um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Lawine.card_desc: [Rüstung] Todesstöße erhöhen dein Lauftempo 5s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Mondflug.card_desc: [Gleitflug] Nach dem Ende von Gleitflug verursachst du 3s lang 20% mehr Waffenschaden.

Schneekugel.card_desc: [Eissturm] Eissturm verursacht nun 100% mehr Schaden, die Energiekosten betragen 50% und die Dauer sinkt auf 3s.

Teleport.card_desc: [Blinzeln] Erhöht die Reichweite von Blinzeln um {scale=6|6}%.

T\u00f6dlicher Frost.card_desc: [Gleitflug] Todesstöße reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Gleitflug um {scale=20|20}%.

Trick.card_desc: [Gleitflug] Nach Aktivierung von Gleitflug wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Weitergehen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=30|30} LP.

Wurmloch.card_desc: [Blinzeln] Blinzeln kann innerhalb von 4s reaktiviert werden, um an deinen Ausgangspunkt zurückzukehren.

Acclimatation.card_desc: [Arme] Votre arme ne vous repousse plus et vous inflige {scale=60|10}% de dégâts en moins.

Avalanche.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 5s.

Boule \u00e0 neige.card_desc: [Tempête de glace] Tempête de glace inflige 100% de dégâts supplémentaires et ne coûte que 50% de charge d'ultime, mais ne dure que 3s.

Champ glac\u00e9.card_desc: [Bloc de glace] Pendant Bloc de glace, vous regagnez {scale=50|50} PV par seconde.

Froid intense.card_desc: [Bloc de glace] Activer Bloc de glace redonne {scale=2|2} munitions.

Froid mortel.card_desc: [Envol] Chaque exécution réduit le temps de recharge d'Envol de {scale=20|20}%.

Impact.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Marchefaille.card_desc: [Transfert] Pendant 2s après Transfert, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Revigor\u00e9e.card_desc: [Transfert] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=8|8}% pendant 4s après Transfert.

Sang-froid.card_desc: [Bloc de glace] Bloc de glace se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Septi\u00e8me ciel.card_desc: [Envol] Vous infligez 20% de dégâts supplémentaires pendant 3s après la fin d'Envol.

T\u00e9l\u00e9portation.card_desc: [Transfert] La portée de Transfert augmente de {scale=6|6}%.

Trou de ver.card_desc: [Transfert] Pendant 4s, vous pouvez réutiliser Transfert pour revenir à l'emplacement initial.

Vent hurlant.card_desc: [Bloc de glace] Pendant 4s après Bloc de glace, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Vol rapide.card_desc: [Envol] Pendant Envol, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=5|5}% de plus.

\u51b0\u523a\u8ff8\u53d1.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人时所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u51b0\u96ea\u4e16\u754c.card_desc: [冰风暴] 冰风暴的伤害提高100%，只消耗充能的60%，但持续时间减少至2秒

\u51b7\u8840.card_desc: [寒冰屏障] 减少你寒冰屏障的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u523a\u9aa8\u5bd2\u98ce.card_desc: [寒冰屏障] 激活时获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u5486\u54ee\u5bd2\u98ce.card_desc: [寒冰屏障] 寒冰屏障结束后移动速度提升{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u5927\u96ea\u707e.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人时获得{scale=8|8}%的移动速度，持续5秒

\u5bd2\u51b7\u6297\u6027.card_desc: [武器] 你的武器攻击对自己造成的伤害降低{scale=60|10}%，且不再击退自己

\u6025\u901f\u5bd2\u98ce.card_desc: [闪现] 闪现后4秒内武器装填速度提升{scale=8|8}%

\u6076\u4f5c\u5267I.card_desc: [飞行术] 使用飞行术时回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u65e0\u62d8\u65e0\u675f.card_desc: [护甲] 在非战斗状态下移动速度提高{scale=5|5}%

\u65f6\u7a7a\u6cd5\u5e08.card_desc: [闪现] 闪现的冷却时间缩短1秒，并且闪现后的4秒内可以再次激活技能返回原位置

\u6781\u5bd2\u9886\u57df.card_desc: [寒冰屏障] 寒冰屏障结束时获得{scale=5|5}%的伤害减免，持续2秒

\u7ff1\u7fd4.card_desc: [飞行术] 飞行术的持续时间增加{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u81f4\u547d\u5bd2\u610f.card_desc: [飞行术] 击败敌人时降低飞行术的冷却时间{scale=20|20}%

\u88c2\u9699\u7a7f\u884c.card_desc: [闪现] 闪现后提升{scale=8|8}%的移动速度，持续2秒

\u8fc5\u6377\u5973\u5deb.card_desc: [飞行术] 增加飞行术的飞行速度{scale=5|5}%

\u96ea\u82b1\u95ea\u70c1.card_desc: [闪现] 闪现后恢复{scale=75|75}点生命值

\u98de\u5929\u4e13\u7cbe.card_desc: [飞行术] 飞行术结束后的3秒内武器攻击造成的伤害提高20%

Biting Cold.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting a slowed enemy champion with your weapon generates 1 ammo. 5s CD.

Break Free.card_desc: [Blink] Using Blink makes you immune to Crowd Control and Status Effects for {2}s

Cold Acclimation.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon no longer knocks you back and deals {25}% less self damage

Cold Blooded.card_desc: [Ice Block] Reduce the Cooldown of Ice Block by {1}s.

Frigid Field.card_desc: [Blink] Freeze the ground for 5s, slowing targets inside by {20}%

Frost Bound.card_desc: [Weapon] Your shots freeze enemy pets for {2}s

Over the Moon.card_desc: [Soar] Reduce the Cooldown of Soar by {1}s

Reprieve.card_desc: [Ice Block] Regenerate 75 health every 1s during Ice Block

Safeguarded.card_desc: [Blink] For 1.5s after using Blink, you cannot be hit for more than 40% of your maximum Health.

Stand Still.card_desc: [Weapon] Deal {6}% more damage if only hitting one target

Swift Witch.card_desc: [Soar] Increase the flight speed of Soar by {10}%

Wormhole.card_desc: [Blink] For 2s after blinking, you may re-activate Blink to return to your original location.

A sangre fr\u00eda.card_desc: [Bloque de hielo] Se reduce la recarga de Bloque de hielo en {scale=1|1}s.

Aclimataci\u00f3n g\u00e9lida.card_desc: [Arma] Tu arma inflige un {scale=60|10}% menos de autodaño y ya no te repeles.

Agujero de gusano.card_desc: [Atajo] Tras lanzar Atajo, si la vuelves a lanzar en los 4s siguientes, volverás a la ubicación del lanzamiento original.

Aullido vendaval.card_desc: [Bloque de hielo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 4s después de que acabe Bloque de hielo.

Avalancha.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 5s tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

Bruja rauda.card_desc: [Vuelo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=5|5}% durante Vuelo.

Brujer\u00eda.card_desc: [Vuelo] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al activar Vuelo.

Campo fr\u00edgido.card_desc: [Bloque de hielo] Te curas {scale=50|50} cada 1s mientras Bloque de hielo esté activa.

Congelado.card_desc: [Atajo] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 4s tras usar Atajo.

Destello.card_desc: [Atajo] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS tras usar Atajo.

Domo de nieve.card_desc: [Tormenta glaciar] Aumenta el daño infligido por Tormenta glaciar un 100% y se reduce la carga de la habilidad definitiva un 50%, pero se reduce su duración a 3s.

En los cuernos de la luna.card_desc: [Vuelo] El daño que infliges con los disparos de tu arma aumenta un 20% durante 3s después de que acabe Vuelo.

Gran distancia.card_desc: [Vuelo] La duración de Vuelo aumenta en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Helada letal.card_desc: [Atajo] Se reduce la recarga de Vuelo un {scale=20|20}% tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

Hipotermia.card_desc: [Bloque de hielo] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición tras activar Bloque de hielo.

Impacto.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reducen tus recargas activas un {scale=10|10}% tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

Paso abismal.card_desc: [Atajo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s tras usar Atajo.

Sin descanso.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=30|30} PS.

Teletransportador.card_desc: [Atajo] La distancia que recorres con Blink aumenta un {scale=6|6}%.

Arrefecida.card_desc: [Piscada] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a velocidade em que carrega a arma por 4s após usar a Piscada.

Avalanche.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento por 5s após dar o disparo fatal de uma eliminação.

Bruxa Veloz.card_desc: [Sobrevoo] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=5|5}% enquanto estiver usando o Sobrevoo.

Buraco de Minhoca.card_desc: [Piscada] Piscada pode ser usada uma segunda vez, dentro de 4s, para voltar ao local de origem.

Campo G\u00e9lido.card_desc: [Bloco de Gelo] Cura {scale=50|50} a cada 1s enquanto o Bloco de Gelo estiver ativo.

Cintilar.card_desc: [Piscada] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} de vida após usar Piscada.

De Boa no Frio.card_desc: [Arma] Sua arma causa {scale=60|10}% menos dano autoinfligido e você não sofre mais repulsão.

Deslocamento.card_desc: [Piscada] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento por 2s após usar a Piscada.

Frio de Lascar.card_desc: [Bloco de Gelo] Gera {scale=2|2} de munição após ativar o Bloco de Gelo.

Frio Mortal.card_desc: [Sobrevoo] Reduz o intervalo do Sobrevoo em {scale=20|20}% após dar o disparo fatal de uma eliminação.

Globo de Neve.card_desc: [Nevasca] Nevasca causa 100% mais dano e consome apenas 50% da energia da suprema, mas dura apenas 3s.

Grande Dist\u00e2ncia.card_desc: [Sobrevoo] Aumenta a duração do Sobrevoo em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Impacto.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% os intervalos ativos após dar o tiro fatal em um inimigo.

Sangue Frio.card_desc: [Bloco de Gelo] Reduz o intervalo do Bloco de Gelo em {scale=1|1}s.

Sob o Luar.card_desc: [Sobrevoo] Aumenta em 20% o dano causado pelos disparos da sua arma por 3s após o fim do Sobrevoo.

Teleporte.card_desc: [Piscada] Aumenta a distância percorrida pela Piscada em {scale=6|6}%.

Travessura.card_desc: [Sobrevoo] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição após ativar Sobrevoo.

Vento Uivante.card_desc: [Bloco de Gelo] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 4s após o Bloco de Gelo acabar.

\u0412\u043e\u044e\u0449\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Блок льда] По окончании действия Блока льда ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 4 с.

\u0417\u0430\u043a\u0430\u043b\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваше оружие больше не отбрасывает вас и наносит вам на {scale=60|10}% меньше урона.

\u041a\u0443\u0441\u0430\u0447\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Блок льда] Активация Блока льда генерирует {scale=2|2} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041b\u0430\u0432\u0438\u043d\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 5 с. после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u041d\u0430 \u0441\u0435\u0434\u044c\u0.card_desc: [Полет] В течение 3 с. после окончания Полета выстрелы из вашего оружия наносят на 20% больше урона.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0431\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Мгновение] После использования Мгновения вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Полет] Ваша скорость передвижения в полете повышается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0440\u044b\u0432.card_desc: [Броня] Текущая перезарядка ваших способностей сокращается на {scale=10|10}% после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u0420\u0430\u0437\u043b\u043e\u043c.card_desc: [Мгновение] После использования Мгновения скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0421\u043d\u0435\u0436\u043e\u043a.card_desc: [Буран] Урон от Бурана повышается на 100%, а его заряд суперудара снижается на 50%, но длительность действия уменьшается до 3 с.

\u0422\u0435\u043b\u0435\u043f\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Мгновение] Дальность перемещения во время Мгновения увеличивается на {scale=6|6}%.

\u0423\u0431\u0438\u0439\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Полет] Перезарядка Полета сокращается на {scale=20|20}% после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u0425\u043b\u0430\u0434\u043d\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Блок льда] Перезарядка Блока льда сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0425\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0434.card_desc: [Мгновение] После использования Мгновения скорость перезарядки повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 4 с.

\u0425\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0434\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Блок льда] Пока действует Блок льда, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед. в секунду.

\u0427\u0435\u0440\u0432\u043e\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Мгновение] В течение 4 с. Мгновение можно использовать повторно, чтобы вернуться в первую точку активации способности.

Ch\u0142\u00f3d.card_desc: [Mrugnięcie] Zwiększa szybkość przeładowania o {scale=8|8}% przez 4 s po użyciu Mrugnięcia.

Cie\u0144 Ksi\u0119\u017cyca.card_desc: [Szybowanie] Zwiększa obrażenia, które zadajesz strzałami bronią, o 20% na 3 s po zakończeniu Szybowania.

Gryz\u0105cy mr\u00f3z.card_desc: [Lodowy blok] Aktywacja Lodowego bloku generuje {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji.

Lawina.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 5 s po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu.

Polarne pole.card_desc: [Lodowy blok] Przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ co 1 s podczas trwania Lodowego bloku.

Przez wymiary.card_desc: [Mrugnięcie] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s po użyciu Mrugnięcia.

\u015anie\u017cna kula.card_desc: [Śnieżyca] Obrażenia od Śnieżycy są większe o 100% i zużywa o 50% mniej ładunku arcyzdolności, ale czas jej trwania jest krótszy o 3 s.

Teleport.card_desc: [Mrugnięcie] Zwiększa pokonywany dystans przez Mrugnięcie o {scale=6|6}%.

Tunel czasoprzestrzenny.card_desc: [Mrugnięcie] Przez 4 s po Mrugnięciu możesz mrugnąć ponownie, aby wrócić do poprzedniej lokalizacji.

Wielka odleg\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Szybowanie] Wydłuża czas trwania Szybowania o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Wyj\u0105ca wichura.card_desc: [Lodowy blok] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% przez 4 s po zakończeniu Lodowego bloku.

Wytrzyma\u0142o\u015b\u0107 na ch\u0142\.card_desc: [Broń] Twoja broń zadaje ci o {scale=60|10}% mniej samoobrażeń i nie odrzuca cię.

Zab\u00f3jczy mr\u00f3z.card_desc: [Szybowanie] Skraca czas odnowienia Szybowania o {scale=20|20}% po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu.

Zderzenie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Skraca aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}% po zadaniu zabójczego ciosu.

Zimna krew.card_desc: [Lodowy blok] Skraca czas odnowienia Lodowego bloku o {scale=1|1} s.

Zwinna j\u0119dza.card_desc: [Szybowanie] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu podczas Szybowania o {scale=5|5}%.

Bulutlar\u0131n \u00dczerinde.card_desc: [Süzülme] Süzülme bittikten sonra 3sn boyunca silah atışlarının hasarını %20 artır.

Buzlu.card_desc: [Sıçra] Sıçra kullandıktan sonra 4sn boyunca Yeniden Doldurma Hızını %{scale=8|8} artır.

\u00c7\u0131\u011f.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 5sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} artır.

Darbe.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Kar K\u00fcresi.card_desc: [Buz Fırtınası] Buz Fırtınası'nın hasarı %100 artar ve Ulti dolumu %50 azalır ancak süresi 3sn kısalır.

Keskin So\u011fuk.card_desc: [Buz Bloku] Buz Bloku'nu etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=2|2} Cephane oluştur.

\u00d6ld\u00fcren Ayaz.card_desc: [Süzülme] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra Süzülme'nin Bekleme Süresini %{scale=20|20} azalt.

So\u011fuk Alan.card_desc: [Buz Bloku] Buz Bloku sırasında her 1 saniyede {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

So\u011fuk Direnci.card_desc: [Silah] Silahın sana %{scale=60|10} daha az hasar verir ve seni Geri İtmez.

So\u011fuk Kanl\u0131.card_desc: [Buz Bloku] Buz Bloku'nun Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azaltır.

Solucan Deli\u011fi.card_desc: [Sıçra] Sıçra, başlangıçtaki kullanım noktasına dönmek için 4sn içinde yeniden ateşlenebilir.

Uluyan Bora.card_desc: [Buz Bloku] Buz Bloku sona erdikten sonra Hareket Hızını 4sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Yar\u0131k Y\u00fcr\u00fcmesi.card_desc: [Sıçra] Sıçra kullandıktan sonra 2sn boyunca Hareket Hızını %{scale=8|8} artır.
